forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and becoming windy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and becoming windy. Low 48F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High near 15C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with a steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 57F. SSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
